nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    cons_meter_number,
    dtr_meter_number,
    COUNT(*) as CONS_Zero_No
from fire_temp_table
group by 
    cons_meter_number,
    dtr_meter_number
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT *,
    100 * (zero_no / DTR_Zero_no) as PCT_Zero_DTR_Match,
    100 * (zero_no / CONS_Zero_No) as PCT_Zero_CONS_Match
from fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    cons_meter_number,
    dtr_meter_number,
    Zero_No as Zero_No_Match,
    DTR_Zero_no,
    CONS_Zero_No,
    PCT_Zero_DTR_Match,
    PCT_Zero_CONS_Match
from fire_temp_table
where PCT_Zero_DTR_Match > 50
order by 
    cons_meter_number,
    PCT_Zero_DTR_Match DESC
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: Read CSV
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it.
nodes.hint: Infer the schema when a new file is selected or the file content has changed

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: path
fields.title: Path
fields.description: Path of the file/directory

fields.name: separator
fields.title: Separator
fields.description: CSV Separator

fields.name: header
fields.title: Header
fields.description: Whether the file has a header row

fields.name: dropSpecialCharacterInColumnName
fields.title: Drop Special Character In ColumnName
fields.description: Whether to drop the Special Characters and Spaces in Column Name.

fields.name: mode
fields.title: Mode
fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.title: Whether to Add Input File Name as Column in the Dataframe
fields.description: Add the new field:input_file_name

fields.name: quote
fields.title: Quote
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quoted values where the separator can be part of the value

fields.name: escape
fields.title: Escape
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quotes inside an already quoted value.

fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Columns from CSV

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
select
    cons_meter_number,
    CONS_Block_Energy_Wh_Imp,
    Clock,
    date_str,
    time_str
from fire_temp_table
where
    CONS_Average_Voltage <= 0 AND 
    CONS_Block_Energy_Wh_Imp <= 0
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
select
    dtr_meter_number,
    DTR_Block_Energy_Wh_Imp,
    Clock,
    date_str,
    time_str
from fire_temp_table
where 
DTR_Block_Energy_Wh_Imp <= 0 
-- AND DTR_Average_Voltage > 0
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes

fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    meter_number as dtr_meter_number,
    Clock,
    Block_Energy_Wh_Imp as DTR_Block_Energy_Wh_Imp,
    left(Clock,10) as date_str,
    left(right(Clock,8),5) as time_str,
    L1_Voltage,
    L2_Voltage,
    L3_Voltage,
    L3_Voltage+L2_Voltage+L1_Voltage as DTR_Average_Voltage
    
FROM fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    meter_number as cons_meter_number,
    Clock,
    Block_Energy_Wh_Imp as CONS_Block_Energy_Wh_Imp,
    left(Clock,10) as date_str,
    left(right(Clock,8),5) as time_str,
    Average_Voltage as CONS_Average_Voltage
    
FROM fire_temp_table
fields.title: SQL

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
select
    dtr_meter_number,
    cons_meter_number,
    aa.Clock,
    aa.date_str,
    aa.time_str
from tempTable1 aa JOIN tempTable2 bb
on aa.Clock = bb.Clock and aa.date_str = bb.date_str and aa.time_str = bb.time_str
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    meter_number as cons_meter_number,
    Clock,
    Block_Energy_Wh_Imp as CONS_Block_Energy_Wh_Imp,
    left(Clock,10) as date_str,
    left(right(Clock,8),5) as time_str,
    Average_Voltage as CONS_Average_Voltage
    
FROM fire_temp_table
WHERE meter_number = "S1417589"

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    aa.*,
    cons_meter_number
from tempTable1 aa join tempTable2 bb ON
    aa.dtr_meter_number = bb.dtr_meter_number
    AND date_str >= CONS_Event_Start_Date
    AND date_str <= CONS_Event_End_Date
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the CSV
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the CSV
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Column Formats for the CSV
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns
